opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Irving J. Friedberg v. Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board

opinion:
361 U.S. 2

80 S.Ct. 63

4 L.Ed.2d 50

Irving J. FRIEDBERG et al.
v.
PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD.

No. 140.

Supreme Court of the United States

October 12, 1959

Messrs. Samuel Handler and Arthur Berman, for appellants.

Anne X. Alpern, Atty. Gen. of Pennsylvania, and Mr. Harry J. Rubin, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The appeal is dismissed. Treating the papers whereon the appeal was taken as a petition for writ of certiorari, certiorari is denied.
